edu.iu.harp.partition

Class Partition<P extends Simple>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.resource.Transferable
      • edu.iu.harp.partition.Partition<P>

  • public final class Partition<P extends Simple>
extends Transferable
    Partition provides a wrapper on an array or an object. Partitions have partition IDs which is used to identify themselves in the distributed dataset.
